name: Demon Foster
description:
Years of Conquest and Tyranny has led the Demon Lord to his blood-soaked throne, but the joy of conquest faded away hundreds of years later. Now he's void of any enjoyment, craving for something new besides killing Adventurers and managing his kingdom. 

One day, a child wanders into his kingdom, one with tremendous, powerful potential. And the Demon Lord will be responsible for taking care of her! Will his tyranny end at the hands of a child? 

That is the question that he must answer himself.

Demon Foster is a short, 30-minute, kinetic visual novel involving a child, the demon lord, and the weight of expectations.

It is also our crew's very first visual novel! So feedback is very much appreciated.

Please follow our Twitter for news on our future projects!
